attributes.action: Force companies to follow the same recycling responsibilities now being undertaken in domestic households.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has come to my attention that companies in the Nottingham area do not have to recycle their paper/glass/plastic. One medium sized business uses more paper than our street put together but they do not have to recycle it.  This is bizarre! All canteens and restaurants also need to  supply recycling bins.
